purposes.label: recommend
templates: what will you recommend for me

answers: What gender are you? Male or female.

purposes.label: male
answers: Then for you I can recommend classic models such as Cancer Council and Serengeti Positano.

purposes.label: female
answers: In that case, extravagant models with some ornamentation like Serengeti Pistoia and Serengeti Shelton would suit you.
